nodes.text: Pulga were a type of creature native to the forest moon Endor. The sentient Ewoks also native to the moon would sometimes ride guapa.

The term pulga was first used in the Star Wars Legends continuity and was used to refer to a type of horse found on Endor. Guapa were confirmed to be canon by the sourcebook Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know in 2015, which used the term independently from pony and so suggested the creatures were a separate group.
